mapper.sql: id, title, employ_num, status, update_date, create_time, sync
mapper.insert: insert into c_msg_template (id, title, employ_num, status, update_date, create_time, sync, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sync,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into c_msg_template
id,
title,
employ_num,
status,
update_date,
create_time,
sync,
content,

mapper.update:
update c_msg_template
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employ_num = #{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sync = #{sync,jdbcType=CHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_msg_template set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employ_num = #{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sync = #{sync,jdbcType=CHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_msg_template set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employ_num = #{employNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sync = #{sync,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title, t.content, t.employ_num AS employNum, t.`status`, t.update_date AS updateDate, t.create_time AS createTime, t.sync, r.employee_name AS employName FROM c_msg_template AS t LEFT JOIN c_reviewers AS r ON t.employ_num = r.employ_num ORDER BY t.id DESC
